original_text: He took also out of the city an eunuch, which had the charge of the men of war; and seven men of them that were near the king's person, which were found in the city; and the principal scribe of the host, who mustered the people of the land; and threescore men of the people of the land, that were found in the midst of the city.
korean_text: 또 성 안에서 사람을 사로잡았으니 곧 군사를 거느린 지휘관 한 사람과 또 성중에서 만난 왕의 내시 칠 명과 군인을 감독하는 군 지휘관의 서기관 하나와 성 안에서 만난 평민 육십 명이라

sentences.original_text: He took also out of the city
which had charge of men of war
which were found in the city
and principal scribe of the host
who mustered the people of the land
and threescore men of the people of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅 백성 중 육십 명을

sentences.original_text: that were found in the midst of the city
